properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 18 at 3:45AM EST until January 18 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Cleveland OH
properties.description:
...Storm System Will Bring Wintry Weather to the Region...

.A low pressure system will move northeast through the central
Great Lakes Saturday. A mixed bag of precipitation will change
over to all rain today. Then, as the low pressure system moves
northeast of the area, a cold front will move east across the area
and change all of the rain over to mainly lake effect snow.

* WHAT...Mixed precipitation occurring. Additional snow
accumulations of 3 to 5 inches and ice accumulations of a light
glaze. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph.

* WHERE...Northern Erie, Crawford and Southern Erie counties.

* WHEN...Until 10 PM EST this evening.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Gusty winds could
bring down tree branches.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Warmer air will gradually move into the
area this morning and will change the mixed precipitation over
to all rain.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

The Pennsylvania Department of Transportation and Pennsylvania
Turnpike Commission remind motorists to adjust speeds based on
driving conditions as winter weather impacts Pennsylvania
roadways. Visit www.511pa.com for the latest travel, roadway, and
traffic conditions.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM EST THIS EVENING
